# recrd - AI Revenue Intelligence Platform

> recrd is an AI-powered revenue intelligence platform that automatically records sales calls, updates CRM systems, and provides coaching insights to help sales teams close more deals.

## What is recrd?

recrd connects to your video conferencing tools (Zoom, Google Meet, Microsoft Teams) and automatically:
- Records and transcribes every sales call
- Extracts key information (MEDDIC fields, objections, next steps)
- Updates your CRM (HubSpot, Salesforce) automatically
- Scores calls against your sales methodology
- Alerts managers to deal risks in real-time
- Drafts personalized follow-up emails

## Key Features

- **CRM Auto-Sync**: MEDDIC, BANT, and custom fields updated automatically after every call
- **AI Coaching Scorecards**: Every call scored against your sales methodology
- **Real-Time Risk Alerts**: Budget concerns, competitor mentions, ghosting signals detected instantly
- **Auto Follow-Up Drafts**: Personalized emails generated based on call content
- **Pipeline Analytics**: Stage conversion rates, cycle trends, bottleneck detection
- **Agent Marketplace**: 9 pre-built AI agents ready to deploy, plus custom workflow builder

## Who is recrd for?

- Account Executives who want to spend less time on data entry
- Sales Managers who need visibility into team performance
- RevOps teams looking to improve CRM data quality
- Sales Enablement teams building coaching programs

## Pricing

- **Starter**: $49/seat/month - Core recording and CRM sync
- **Pro**: $99/seat/month - Full analytics and coaching
- **Enterprise**: Custom pricing - SSO, custom integrations, dedicated support

## Integrations

- Video: Zoom, Google Meet, Microsoft Teams
- CRM: HubSpot, Salesforce
- Communication: Slack, Email
- Calendar: Google Calendar, Outlook
